title: Breathe
description: Take 10 Deep Breaths, hold each breath for 3 seconds!

title: Imagine
description: Close your eyes for 10 minutes and envision a place where you want to be or visit.

title: Vista
description: Find the nearest window and take 2 minutes to view the beauty of the world around you.

title: Plan
description: Take 10 minutes to set a personal goal that you want to achieve this week.

title: Push
description: Do 10 pushups or any variation of a pushup!

title: Climb
description: Go walk up and down at least 8 flights of stairs!

title: Jump
description: Do as many jumping-jacks as you can for 1 minute!

title: Plank
description: Hold a plank for at least 30 seconds! Do this at least 3 times!
